creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and the Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation; purchase from the Thomas Murray Collection
description: blue T-shaped cover with white, light blue, and brown designs (two panels of different widths); curling, white tendrils, light blue square, and brown square at center, framing a light blue circle and white Japanese characters; light blue and white curling floral designs on either side; four small fabric loops, two at TC and two at BC; a blue knotted thread loop attached at both LLC and LRC
markings: verso LLC, Thomas Murray Collection label: JAP 6155
title: Horse trappings (shiri-gake) with crest
